apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - Product Attribute Value Webservice
apiservice.author: Aesir
apiservice.description: Maintains the attribute values, given for the attributes of each product, to generate variants from them

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce Product Attribute Value

field.name: product_attribute_id
field.description: Product Attribute ID of this Value

field.name: sku
field.description: Stocking Key Unit (it will be appended to the product's SKU)

field.name: ordering
field.description: Order for displaying the attribute values

field.name: selected
field.description: If true, it will be the default selected value for this attribute when showing it in shop

field.name: value
field.description: Actual value

field.name: image
field.description: URL of image to display in shop when presenting the value in the options for the product. The image will be imported.

resource.description: New Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

list.description: This operation lists all Aesir E-Commerce Product Attribute Values

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID

field.name: product_attribute_id
field.description: Product Attribute ID of this Value

field.name: sku
field.description: Stocking Key Unit (appended to the product's SKU)

field.name: selected
field.description: If true, it will be the default selected value for this attribute when showing it in shop

field.name: imageurl
field.description:
Product attribute value image URL.
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending filter[include_images]=true

field.name: state
field.description: True if published, false if unpublished]

field.name: include_images
field.description: When true, it populates the image field with the URLs of images. Otherwise, the field will remain empty.

resource.description: Product Attribute ID of this Value
Stocking Key Unit (it will be appended to the product's SKU)
Order for displaying the attribute values
True if published, false if unpublished
If true, it will be the default selected value for this attribute when showing it in shop
URL of image to display in shop when presenting the value in the options for the product.
Start displaying from a certain item in the list
Total number of pages of items
Limit the number of listed items
Sort list by field and direction

item.description: This operation displays a single Aesir E-Commerce Product Attribute Value

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID

resource.description: Product Attribute ID of this Value
Stocking Key Unit (it will be appended to the product's SKU)
Order for displaying the attribute values
True if published, false if unpublished
If true, it will be the default selected value for this attribute when showing it in shop
URL of image to display in shop when presenting the value in the options for the product.

update.description: This operation updates Aesir E-Commerce Product Attribute Value

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID

field.name: sku
field.description: Stocking Key Unit (it will be appended to the product's SKU)

field.name: ordering
field.description: Order for displaying the attribute values

field.name: selected
field.description: If true, it will be the default selected value for this attribute when showing it in shop

field.name: value
field.description: Actual value

field.name: image
field.description: URL of image to display in shop when presenting the value in the options for the product. The image will be imported.

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

delete.description: This operation deletes Aesir E-Commerce Product Attribute Value(s).

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to delete

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

publish.description: This task enables you to set specific Product Attribute Values as published.

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to publish

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

unpublish.description: This task enables you to set specific Product Attribute Values as unpublished.

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to unpublish

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

imageUpload.description: Adds or update an image for a product attribute value. .

field.name: id
field.description: Product attribute value ID to add an image to

field.name: image
field.description: Image (base64 encoded) to be added to this attribute value.

fields.description: Product Attribute Value image upload fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value image upload resources

imageRemove.description: Removes an image from a product attribute value.

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to remove image from

fields.description: Product Attribute Value image remove fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value image remove resources

reorder.description: Updates the order of a certain product attribute value, reordering the other values in the attribute

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to reorder

field.name: ordering
field.description: Order for displaying the attribute value

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

conversionAdd.description: Adds or update a conversion for a product attribute value using a conversion set.

field.name: id
field.description: Product attribute value ID to add this conversion set to

field.name: conversion_set_id
field.description: Conversion Set to use according to the country or region

field.name: value
field.description: Conversion for this attribute value

field.name: image
field.description: URL of the image to show for a value when using a conversion set. The image will be imported.

fields.description: Product Attribute Value conversion add fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value conversion add resources

conversionRemove.description: Removes a conversion from a product attribute value.

field.name: id
field.description: Product attribute value ID to remove this conversion set from

field.name: conversion_set_id
field.description: Conversion set to remove from this product attribute value

fields.description: Product Attribute Value conversion remove fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value conversion remove resources

conversionImageUpload.description: Adds or update an image for a conversion set of a product attribute value.

field.name: id
field.description: Product attribute value ID to add this conversion set image to

field.name: conversion_set_id
field.description: Conversion Set to use according to the country or region

field.name: image
field.description: Image (base64 encoded) to be added to the conversion set of the attribute value

fields.description: Product Attribute Value conversion image upload fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value conversion image upload resources

conversionImageRemove.description: Removes an image from a conversion set of a product attribute value.

field.name: id
field.description: Product attribute value ID to remove this conversion set image from

field.name: conversion_set_id
field.description: Conversion set from the product attribute value to remove the image from

fields.description: Product Attribute Value conversion image upload fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value conversion image upload resources

translate.description: Adds or update a translation for a Product Attribute Value using a language code

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to translate

field.name: lang_code
field.description: Language code

field.name: value
field.description: Translated value

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

translateRemove.description: Removes a translation from a Product Attribute Value

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID to remove translation from

field.name: lang_code
field.description: Language code

fields.description: Product Attribute Value translate remove fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value translate remove resources

translateConversion.description: Adds or update a translation for a conversion of a product attribute value using a language code.

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID

field.name: conversion_set_id
field.description: Conversion set

field.name: lang_code
field.description: Language code

field.name: value
field.description: Translated value for the conversion of this attribute value

fields.description: Product Attribute Value translate conversion fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product Attribute Value translate conversion resources

translateConversionRemove.description: Removes a translation from a conversion of a product attribute value.

field.name: id
field.description: Product Attribute Value ID

field.name: conversion_set_id
field.description: Conversion set

field.name: lang_code
field.description: Language code

fields.description: Product Attribute Value translate conversion remove fields

resource.description: Product Attribute Value ID upon success, zero on error
